com.leonovich.itcrowd.dao

Interface ITopicDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGenericDao<Topic,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopicDao

    public interface ITopicDao
extends IGenericDao<Topic,java.lang.Long>
    Interface for implementation by Topic class for specific operations with Topic-entity
    See Also:
